# Draft:Battle of Jinpo

A large-scale naval battle that took place in the 6th year of King U , during the invasion of Japanese raiders at the end of the Goryeo Dynasty . It is a battle that defeated the Japanese raiders who disturbed the south of Goryeo at the time . It is also classified as one of the fights that showed the end of the chaos in East Asia.
In August 1380, a large fleet of over 500 pirates invaded Jinpo, tied the ships with large ropes, and used it as a base . ) and gave Choi Mu- seon 100 battleships and sent them down to Jinpo to block the pirates. At this time, the cannon developed by Choi Mu-seon was used for the first time.[3] According to it, it is recorded that fire barrels and firearms played the biggest role in burning the ships of the Japanese army.
